titleStmt.title: The medal of John Bayes a satyr against folly and knavery.
titleStmt.author: Shadwell, Thomas, 1642?-1692.

notesStmt.note: An answer by Thomas Shadwell to Dryden's The medal, which is an attack on Shaftesbury. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in British Library and Duke University Library.
